title: Server & Network - Update SSL Certificate
description: An SSL certificate on a client's web server is about to expire and needs to be replaced.

tasks.description: Purchase a new SSL certificate for the client's domain.
tasks.expected_outcome: A new certificate file is obtained.

tasks.description: Install the new SSL certificate on the web server (e.g., IIS, Apache).
tasks.expected_outcome: The new certificate is installed on the server.

tasks.description: Verify the new certificate is working correctly by Browse to the website.
tasks.expected_outcome: The website loads securely with the new certificate.
